name: The Night Soup - DEMO
description:
Southside town, there's one small restaurant that is open from 10pm until 7 am in the morning. Nathan, the chef and the restaurant owner open that business differently. Because he can compete with other restaurants when he opens in the daytime. The game will be driven by story progression. Some characters will give the quest and give new recipes. There are a lot of new menus, new cooking styles, new characters, and new events unlocked every day.

The base of gameplay is point-and-click. Almost all events and actions are triggered only by using the mouse button. Creating and combining the ingredients will create the perfect score food. Enjoy the calm atmosphere, slice of life story, and the calm night over through the gameplay.

The ex-chef Nathan retires from his job because of the tragic accident. He tries to open a small restaurant late at night. Follow the story of Nathan who serves people who he meets at night. When the night soup is open. A lot of night shift workers come to eat there. All of them have their problems. Nathan just stands in the middle of them, gives advice and sometimes just listens to them. Until he's past coming and needs to be finished to start a new life. Every character is unique and has a problem. Sometimes they are tragic, sometimes they are funny.

Key Feature:

  • Calm night Atmosphere game 
  • Simple gameplay 
  • Story-Driven game 
  • Interactive mini-game 
  • Puzzle-like cooking gameplay 
  • Collecting new dish
